pages.text: $(#063CFF)Void totems$() will protect you from dying from the void and will help you protect your items$(br2)To craft the Void Totem you need to craft a $(l:blanks/totem)Blank Totem$(/l) First
After crafting the blank Totem you just need to smelt it to have a Void Totem
pages.title: Void Totem
